oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Church Street at Eighth Avenue, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1943
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of Church Street at 8th Avenue N in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1943. The movie marquee sign at the Paramount Theatre displays the “Immortal Sergeant” film title. The 1943 City Directory cites the address for the Paramount Theatre at 721 Church Street and the adjacent Sears department store at Church and Eighth. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Paramount Theatre (Nashville, Tenn.); Sears, Roebuck and Company
